comment.author: 68061336@N05
comment._content: There is a possible reference to this officerin the SUPPLEMENT TO THE, LONDON GAZETTE, 11 AUGUST, 1917 Temp. Capt. D. J. Evans resigns his temp commn. on account of ill-health. 30 July 1917. www.london-gazette.co.uk/issues/30226/supplements/8192/pa...

comment.author: 69679868@N03
comment._content: Captain D J Evans would appear to be a Canadian officer.//

comment.author: 64288588@N05
comment._content: There is a Captain David J Evans listed in Canadian records. Date of birth 10 March 1888 at Holyhead, Wales. Unmarried and in the 4th RAMC. Next of kin living in Pontypridd, Glamorganshire.
